card.property: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature can't block this turn. When this artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Perilous Myr
card.property: When this creature dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Platinum Emperion
card.property: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)

card.name: Precursor Golem
card.property: When this creature enters, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

card.name: Prototype Portal
card.property: Imprint — When this artifact enters, you may exile an artifact card from your hand. {X}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card. X is the mana value of that card.

card.name: Ratchet Bomb
card.property: {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact. {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on this artifact.

card.name: Rust Tick
card.property: You may choose not to untap this creature during your untap step. {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as this creature remains tapped.

card.name: Rusted Relic
card.property: Metalcraft — This artifact is a 5/5 Golem artifact creature as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Saberclaw Golem
card.property: {R}: This creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Semblance Anvil
card.property: Imprint — When this artifact enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand. Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Trigon of Corruption
card.property: This artifact enters with three charge counters on it. {B}{B}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from this artifact: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Trigon of Infestation
card.property: This artifact enters with three charge counters on it. {G}{G}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from this artifact: Create a 1/1 green Phyrexian Insect creature token with infect.

card.name: Trigon of Mending
card.property: This artifact enters with three charge counters on it. {W}{W}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from this artifact: Target player gains 3 life.

card.name: Trigon of Rage

card.name: Trigon of Thought
card.property: This artifact enters with three charge counters on it. {U}{U}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact. {2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from this artifact: Draw a card.
